questions.name: The rational proposition or boilerplate
questions.question: What exactly does your business do?

questions.name: Brand champions
questions.question: Who can help spread the word about this brand?

questions.name: Values and organisational behaviours
questions.question: If you were responsible for replacing yourself tomorrow, what key attributes would your replacement need?

questions.name: Current value propositions
questions.question: What makes your brand better than your competitors?

questions.name: Future value propositions
questions.question: What could your brand do better?

questions.name: Personality and tone of voice
questions.question: What personality traits would help set the tone for your brand?

questions.name: Emotions are valuable
questions.question: How do you want our audience to feel?

questions.name: Additional information
questions.question: Is there anything else you think is relevant to this conversation?
